definition: to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
one able to do light manual labor only/semi-able-bodied or part time (farm) worker

sentences.english: Vietnam, for example, has already been a beneficiary of escalating labor costs in China.
sentences.chinese: 例如越南已經成爲了中國勞動力成爲上升的受益者。

sentences.english: They have flexibility in their labor markets.
sentences.chinese: 中國的勞動力市場非常有彈性。

sentences.english: Strengthening training of labor vocational skills , enhancing the proportion of non-farming population.
sentences.chinese: 加強勞動力職業技能培訓，提高非農人口所佔比重。

sentences.english: "Basket carriers" are a typical manifestation of rural surplus labor in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: “背篼”是貴州農村剩餘勞動力的典型表現。

sentences.english: The government also initiated a public-works scheme that is mopping up over 2% of the labour force.
sentences.chinese: 政府還開創了公共勞動計劃，吸收了2%的勞動力。

sentences.english: It's back-breaking labor with severe health consequences, the .
sentences.chinese: 它摧垮勞動力，給這些勞動力帶來嚴重的健康問題。

sentences.english: It's back-breaking labor with severe health consequences, the .
sentences.chinese: 它摧垮勞動力，給這些勞動力帶來嚴重的健康問題。

sentences.english: What it needs is cheap labor and factories, and no one to rock the boat.
sentences.chinese: 它所需要的是廉價勞動力和工廠，並且沒有人來搗亂。

sentences.english: Chart 2: analyzes the condition of transfer of surplus rural labor in Liangzhoudistrict.
sentences.chinese: 第三章涼州區農村剩餘勞動力轉移的影響因素分析。

sentences.english: Several of them have even imported large numbers of laborers.
sentences.chinese: 其中部分國家還輸人大量的勞動力。

sentences.english: The tech industry is also concerned about the difficulty of importing skilled labour.
sentences.chinese: 進口技術勞動力的困難也困擾着科技產業。

sentences.english: Demographic change is another reason why the workforce is greying.
sentences.chinese: 人口變化是勞動力老齡化的又一原因。
實際勞動力有一萬二千。

sentences.english: AS a consequence, companies may look abroad for cheaper bases and workforces.
sentences.chinese: 結果是公司將在海外尋找廉價的生產基地和勞動力。

sentences.english: But it has also made redundant workers more  expendable, and labor hoarding a thing of the past.
sentences.chinese: 但這使得多餘的工人越發昂貴，存蓄勞動力成爲過去。

sentences.english: But it has also made redundant workers more expendable, and labor hoarding a thing of the past.
sentences.chinese: 但這使得多餘的工人越發昂貴，存蓄勞動力成爲過去。
